## IgnoredInterceptorsService.isIgnored() method

Checks specified interceptor whether is ingored

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isIgnored<TType>(interceptorType: Type<TType>, requestId: IgnoredInterceptorId): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  interceptorType | Type&lt;TType&gt; | Type of interceptor that is checked whether is ignored |
|  requestId | [IgnoredInterceptorId](./common.ignoredinterceptorid.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
